snippet.title: Hauntii - Official Announcement Trailer | Day of the Devs 2023
snippet.description: Hauntii is a beguiling adventure built around a creative haunting mechanic that lets players possess the environment and the creatures that inhabit it. Once players have taken control, they can take out enemies using the special abilities of Hauntii’s denizens and conjure solutions to overcome obstacles. Hauntii is launching in 2024 for PC and consoles.
